name: Make room cozy again
description:
controls 

move forward w 

move left-a 

move backs move right-d 

pickup-LMB 

Before Christmas, the Grinch snuck into your room and stole all your New Year's cozy. After himself, he left you 4 riddles, solving which you will make your room cozy again 

Explanations: In this game you have to guess and find 4 items, the item you need to look for is indicated in the upper left part of the screen after finding all 4 items, follow the instructions in the upper right part of the screen
